ygData.subject: Re: Buying small ore pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Bigfoot, I asked this very same question a while back and you aren t going to like the answer. The closest ore or sharpening stones are in Highhold. That s
ygData.messageBody:
Bigfoot,
I asked this very same question a while back and you aren't going to like
the answer.

The closest ore or sharpening stones are in Highhold. That's quite a trip if
you've never made it so I suggest you buy of someone selling ore or stones
locally. Good luck. www.eqvault.com has a guide for a run from Qeynos to
Freeport. If you really want to go I suggest you use this guide to get to
Highhold.

-Faderic

bigfoot wrote:

> From: bigfoot <bigfoot@...>
>
> I am running around in s qeynos, and im looking for a place close to buy
> small ore bits
> Please Help
> Tudan
